snippet: "The Man in the High Castle," Dick's novel of alternate history and mysticism, and an early meditation on the nature of reality, is being developed for a television adaptation by Frank Spotnitz, a writer and producer of "The X-Files," and Ridley...
abstract: "The Man in the High Castle," Dick's novel of alternate history and mysticism, and an early meditation on the nature of reality, is being developed for a television adaptation by Frank Spotnitz, a writer and producer of "The X-Files," and Ridley Scott, the director of "Blade Runner."

headline.main: Syfy Plans Adaptation of Philip K. Dick's 'Man in the High Castle'
headline.print_headline: Syfy Plans to Adapt Philip K. Dick Novel
